subject: HLTH
title: Psychosocial Perspectives on Lifespan Development and Health
description: This course will focus on the normative psychosocial aspects of development of the individual and their influence on the individual's physical and mental health and well-being. Through the use of a developmental systems, lifespan approach, the course will emphasize the life-long process of development. [Note: Formerly HLTH 220/GERON 220]
